description:
The project that P proposes to Executive Director Mishiro is called "Cinderella`s Ball: Power of Smile." It`s meant to be a complex event that will showcase the idols` individual strengths. Though Mishiro`s proposal runs completely counter to this idea, s
Source: crunchyroll
